title: András Béres
text: András Béres (1924 – 14 November 1993) was a <a href="Hungary">Hungarian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="coach%20%28sport%29">manager</a> and player. He used to coach <a href="R.S.C.%20Anderlecht">R.S.C. Anderlecht</a> and <a href="Club%20Brugge">Club Brugge</a> among others.
